name: Armor Stride
description:
Sir Stepsalot finds himself trapped in the Cursed Forest! Luckily, he has his trusty sword and bomb pouch to fend off dangerous monsters. He will have to travel deeper into the forest fighting monsters and avoiding traps. He may find treasure along the way to sell to the shopkeeper. Our knight can't stay in place for too long though. There's a dark curse following him! It's probably best to stay away.

  • Endless, hand-crafted procedural levels
  • Fight dangerous enemies
  • Chiptune by RyanAvx
  • Simple Controls - Use tap/swipe controls or a d-pad to control Sir Stepsalot!
  • Controller Support

[Planned Updates]

  • Mac Version
  • Landscape Support
  • Additional Content
